text: Ra Anumzana mani ruotage hu'neno manisga huno monafinka mani'neno manivava nehigeno agi'amo'ma ruotgema hu'nea Anumzamo'a huno, Nagra mareri agetere'nea kumate mani'noanagi, iza'o avufgama erinte neramino, kumi'agu asunku'ma nehia vahe'ene nemanina, izano agu'amo'ma uramia vahe'ene mani'nena azeri hankavea netue.
